comment: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution. For versions requiring disjoint variables, but fewer axioms, see ~ sbiev and ~ sbievw . (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 13-Jul-2019.)
